action.action-desc: Ms. Pingree of Maine introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to ensure that the Secretary of Veterans Affairs provides veterans with information concerning service-connected disabilities at health care facilities.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Inform All Veterans Act.

section.header: Provision of information at health care facilities

subsection.text: Section 6303 of title 38, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: by redesignating subsection (e) as subsection (f); and
by inserting after subsection (d) the following new subsection (e):

subsection.header: Provision of information at health care facilities

subparagraph.text: make available information described in paragraph (2) at readily accessible locations in health care facilities of the Department of Veterans Affairs; and
ensure that an employee of the Department orally asks each veteran who visits such facility if the veteran wants to receive such information.

paragraph.text: Information described in this paragraph is written information concerning the following:

subparagraph.text: Establishing service connection for a disability.

Contact information (including address, telephone number, and Internet Web site address) of the appropriate offices of the Department of Veterans Affairs that may offer assistance with respect to service-connected disabilities.

subsection.text: Subsection (a) of such section is amended by striking through (d) and inserting through (e).
